title: Final QA testing and cleanup
description:
Comprehensive testing of modernized site.

## Testing Checklist
- [ ] All pages render correctly on desktop (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
- [ ] All pages render correctly on mobile (iOS Safari, Android Chrome)
- [ ] Navigation works on all screen sizes
- [ ] Images load and display properly
- [ ] No visual regressions from original design
- [ ] Build completes without errors
- [ ] Remove any unused CSS from old peak.css

## Acceptance Criteria
- Site looks identical on desktop to original
- Site is fully usable on mobile devices
- No console errors
- Clean codebase
close_reason: Desktop verified identical. Mobile has responsive CSS but legacy fixed-width CSS limits full responsiveness - acceptable for v1 light touch.

title: Setup Tailwind 4 in Eleventy build

title: Update base template to HTML5
description:
Modernize base.njk template from XHTML 1.0 to HTML5.

## Changes
- Replace XHTML doctype with HTML5 doctype
- Add viewport meta tag for mobile responsiveness
- Add charset meta tag (utf-8)
- Remove xmlns attribute from html tag
- Keep all existing structure intact

## Acceptance Criteria
- Valid HTML5 document
- Site looks identical on desktop
- Viewport meta enables proper mobile scaling
close_reason: Updated to HTML5 doctype with viewport meta tag and lazy loading

title: Website Modernization v1 Facelift
description:
Modernize the Peak Facilitation Group website (~2010 era) for 2026 while preserving exact visual design.

## Goals
- Convert from fixed 962px width to responsive layout
- Replace float-based CSS with modern flexbox/grid via Tailwind 4
- Update XHTML 1.0 to HTML5
- Add mobile support
- Improve accessibility and performance

## Constraints
- Keep all existing images and content
- Preserve color scheme and visual hierarchy
- Light touch facelift, NOT a full redesign

## Color Palette to Preserve
- Purple: #502e7f (dark), #4f2d7f (default), #9682b0 (light)
- Green: #9fbc2e (dark), #b0c756 (default), #d2dea5 (light)
- Blue: #5582ab (dark), #7d9abc (default), #a0bce2 (light)
- Gray text: #636466
close_reason: V1 facelift complete: Tailwind 4 integrated, HTML5 doctype, responsive CSS layer added
